transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: GS Gulabayas se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ji ji sir, yah Sahab Gupta baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji, good afternoon sir, Amrit baat kar raha hu main IndiaMART se aapka account manager. Mohammad Gulabesh sir aapka ne aapka number diya hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: Ji, aapka koi concern tha sir IndiaMART ke koi concern raise kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Sir maine to koi concern matlab issue nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha, sir ye number kiska 707650154?
Customer: Hmm, ye bhi Gulveer bhai ka hi number hai bhai.
Executive: Ji, shayad unhone kiya tha unko IndiaMART se matlab kuch issue aa raha hoga, kuch samajhna tha unko portal.
Customer: Ji ji ji, main chalata hu ye number, isliye shayad nahi tha, abhi recharge ye kar raha isme.
Executive: Ji, to matlab matlab unki jo IndiaMART ki application hai sir, wo main hi use kar raha hu.
Customer: Main hi chalata hu.
Executive: Achcha aap use karte hain.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To seller panel kuch wo aapka aaya tha, request aaya tha ki aap video meet karna chahte hain, usko samajhna chahte hain portal.
Customer: Request request aayi thi, aap hi baat hui usse aur usne fir 35 log aaye to 35 logo ne WhatsApp pe photo bhi send kiye. Usne bas bola gaya tha mujhe itna chahiye kaafi, fir main usko kaafi contact kar raha hu, na wo contact utha raha hai, na reach kar raha hai. Aur usko chahiye bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Kis ko call kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Seller ko na list ka.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Yaha jo list aati nahi hai mere paas IndiaMART mein, wo customer jo hai jinko chahiye hota hai jinki wo aati hai request, unhi se baat ki thi maine.
Executive: Achcha achcha, wo seller se baat hui thi aapki?
Customer: Ji ji ji, wahi main baat kar raha hu, seller se baat hui thi, unko chahiye tha product.
Executive: Ji, yaha pe na hamara concern ye raise hua hai ki aapke side se likha hua hai ki client want side phone interest in video meet.
Executive: Matlab aapki taraf se kisi ne raise kiya concern ki unko video meet karna hai, taki unko panel samajh samajh mein aaye ki kaise list wagera ye sab kaise consume kare, kaun sa list consume kare.
Customer: Sir wo to kaafi pehle maine ki thi aur uske baad meri baat ho gayi thi IndiaMART ke ek bande se, to us video call se free Google Meet hui thi. To usne understanding jo thi wo samjha di thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, to pehle ki baat ho chuki hai, 25 September ko aapne raise kiya tha concern ek last aur fir aapne 5 November ko bhi ek concern raise hua hai aapke taraf se.
Customer: Hmm, sir concern to koi aise raise nahi kiya, bas wo alerts aata hai video meet ka, to main usko click karta hu. Hmm, wo actually hoti hai video meet ke liye.
Executive: Haan, wahi concern raise hua tha na, to isliye humne karna tha aapse ek baar video meet.
Customer: To sir concern yahi hai mera kya kehte hain, jo bande hain jo response pe response aa raha hai, uske baad wo product bhi mangwa raha hai WhatsApp matlab WhatsApp pe aur fir matlab is tarike se product mangwa raha hai ki unhe 1000 chahiye, 2000 chahiye, lekin uske baad jab baat aati hai lene ki to fir wo leta nahi hai banda.
Executive: Mana kar dete hain ya fir kuch bahana ya fir call hi nahi uthate aisa hai?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul aisa hai.
Executive: Ji ji, to sir ek cheez mujhe bataiye ki jo aap lead consume karte hain, wo kitni purani lead zyada tar consume karte hain aap?
Customer: Nahi sir main purani leads nahi zyada tar jo leads hoti hain GST verified, wo main zyada use karta hu.
Executive: Achcha aur aapne product se related leads consume karte hain na?
Customer: Ji ji ji, Islamic abaya ke alawa koi main pehle hi filter laga deta hu Islamic abaya hoga.
Executive: Achcha, sir ye Mudabbir jisse kya baat hua tha aapka, ladies designer abaya inka requirement hai Ranchi se. Unse baat hua tha aapka?
Customer: Mudabbir?
Executive: Haan Mudabbir se.
Customer: Nahi sir meri baat nahi hui hai, kyunki abhi tak unki side se koi response nahi aaya wo to.
Executive: Achcha, aur ye Pallavi Return Favors, inse baat hua tha aapka?
Customer: Pallavi, ye kal 5 tarikh ko aapne consume kiya tha do lead unme se aayi hai.
Customer: Sir ye Pallavi ki leads maine kab li hai, kuch bata sakte hain aap?
Executive: 5 tarikh ko liya tha aapne aur 12:21 pe liya tha.
Customer: 5 tarikh, matlab kal hi ki baat kar rahe hain aap?
Executive: Ji, aur ye lead thi 4 November ki.
Customer: Pallavi naam se to mere paas koi lead aa nahi rahi hai. Operation testing unique. Ab uska human ka Pallavi naam Pallavi Return Favor pura naam hai. Denim net total jacket caftan dress abaya ye requirement tha inka.
Customer: Nahi sir mere paas aisi leads to nahi show ho rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Sir to mujhe ye bataiye ki last ke do mahino mein aapka kitna hua hai business IndiaMART ke through?
Customer: Sir maine ye jo last abhi to maine actually 10-12 din se chalaya nahi tha kyunki mere father ki death ho gayi thi to main zyada response nahi kar paya tha abhi bhi. Sorry sorry. Bas usse pehle maine barabar isme response kiya hai aur kaafi time baad bhi kari hai. To zyada khaas kuch response aaya nahi customer ka.
Executive: Abhi tak deals wagera hua ki nahi IndiaMART ke through aapka?
Customer: Nahi ye abhi tak koi deal nahi hua sir.
Executive: Abhi tak ek bhi deal nahi hua?
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Warna sir aapko kaisa aata hai sir? Abhi aap agar bhi 2-3 din pehle ka main record kar nikaloge to maine kaafi customer ko jo leads matlab purchase hui hai usse kaafi customer ko isi number se 70 wale se maine verify karwa liye. Isse kaafi contact pe calls bhi kari hai maine IndiaMART par.
Executive: Hmm. Lekin koi response nahi reh raha hai na?
Customer: Ji ji ji, maine kaafi customer ko contact bhi karne ki koshish kari hai, lagatar calling kari hai.
Executive: Ji, sir aur ye puchna tha ki aap jo deal karte hain, all pan India mein deal karte hain ya fir local mein hi karte hain ya UP mein hi?
Customer: Ye to mujhe nahi pata.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap agar customer agar aapse deal karna chahega pure India ka koi, jaise South ka koi customer aapse deal karna chahega to aap karenge?
Customer: Ji bilkul agar India mein Kerala kyunki hamare paas offline jo hai matlab IndiaMART ke hatke bhi hamare paas jo customer hai wo Kerala wagera ke side ke hain already.
Executive: Achcha zyada tar.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aur sir aapke competitor hain ye Hindustani Marketing karke Rampur ke, pata hai aapko?
Customer: Ji competitor to ki har cheez mein hai na. Jabhi to IndiaMART ki ye jo lead hai ye purchase ki hai warna taki koi response isse hi badhiya aaye thoda sa.
Executive: Ji, ye Hindustani Marketing karke hi aapke hi Rampur ke hain jo aapke product line mein deal karte hain. Wo bhi achcha business kar rahe hain IndiaMART ke through. Aur Ram Rampur se Aasma Abaya Collection bhi hai ek.
Customer: Sir kaun kya naam bataya aapne?
Executive: Aasma Abaya Collection.
Customer: Aatma Abaya Collection Rampur Aatma nahi Aasma Aasma.
Executive: Achcha Aasma Abaya Collection.
Customer: To ye IndiaMART mein nahi hai?
Executive: Ye IndiaMART pe hain aur ye 7 saal se hain but ye aap hi jo aap service abhi use kar rahe hain na wahi use kar rahe hain ye. Lekin ek Hindustan Hindustani Marketing karke hain client.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji, jo aap hi ke Rampur se hi hain. Abaya mein bhi ye deal karte hain. Unhone TrustSeal liya hua hai IndiaMART se matlab aapse upar wali service. To na ye aapse upar dikhte hain IndiaMART pe. Agar koi customer aa raha hai IndiaMART pe aur wo abaya search kar raha hai UP mein to aap unki company pehle dikh rahi hai fir baad mein aapki company dikh rahi hai. To log kya kar rahe hain na ki wo upar dikh rahe hain to unke company pe footfall zyada aa raha hai. Aur sir aapne better response to tabhi matlab purchase kiya jayega na jab is wale response pe koi wo milega mujhe.
Executive: Haan wo to main maine aapko just bataya. Nahi main bhi aapko ek baat bata raha hu. Itna better response jab mujhe isi isse kuch na kuch aisa lagega ki haan bhai kuch ho raha hai IndiaMART se tabhi to maine aise purchase karunga. Aise thodi karunga.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To aap na jo lead consume kar rahe hain na sir, wo try kariye ki 5 ghante se kam wali lead ho aur jo jo customer hain jo jo kharidne wale hain wo IndiaMART pe kam se kam 2 saal se ho. 2 saal plus buyer ho wo. Thik hai? Ek baar aap na aa jate to main aapko samjha deta Google Meet pe badhiya se.
Customer: Sir main to aa jaunga, aap bataiye.
Executive: Main aapko send karu Google Meet ka request?
Customer: Ji ji aap kar dijiye send mujhe.
Executive: Dekhiye kya hoga Amrit Pandey ke naam se. Ye ye email ID hai aapke phone mein na GS Gulabayas pe jo email hai aapke phone mein hai na?
Customer: Ji ji bilkul hai.
Executive: Ji kya hoga dekhiye Amrit ke naam se gaya hoga.
Aapne email ID pe send kiya?
Executive: Haan mail pe kiya hai.
Customer: GS Foot Sabaya wale email pe to koi response nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Email nahi aaya ab tak?
Customer: Bilkul nahi aaya, kis mail pe kiya?
Executive: Ye bhi achcha hai.
Executive: Main mail bhi bata de raha hu kis mail pe gaya hai.
Executive: Aapko WhatsApp pe send karu fir?
Executive: WhatsApp pe bhej dijiye, koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Ji is wale pe bhej de raha hu.
Customer: Ye aa gaya, ye aa gaya, Pandey ke naam se aa gaya. Ji ji. Achcha main request join kar raha hu. Download ho rahi hai bhai forward. Sir maine join kar liya.
Executive: Call cut kar du ab?
Customer: Haan yaha se call cut kar dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good responses from leads.

- Feels that leads are not converting into sales.

- Expressed concern about non-serious buyers on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume leads effectively.

- Executive offered a Google Meet session for better understanding.

- Executive shared details of competitors doing well.



Next Steps: 

- Executive sent a Google Meet request to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, google meet, competitors, trustseal, gst verified
